mdRecord.dcterms:title: Copy of letters, Ann Pamela Cunningham to Devereux and Co., ca. 1860 June
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cunningham, Ann Pamela, 1816-1875
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Copy of letters from Ann Pamela Cunningham to Devereux and Co., ca. June 1860. Copies of at least two letters, in writing of secretaries Mary McMakin and Sarah Tracy. Regent cannot act to relieve financial embarrassments of Devereux and Co. Information reaches her that George Devereux has no other support for his family since financial crisis except money furnished for Mount Vernon Record and Portraits. Demands to know if this is true. Must have written agreement about Portraits to be supplied Mount Vernon. Half of the money sent to Devereux and Co. for portraits is supposed to have been sent to Mr. Riggs as their donation.
